Description: Blade knife on fine beige flint, with rounded butt, steep retouch all along slightly concave back, retouched unifacially at butt end, and bifacially around point.
Curator's comments: Blade knife is the term used by D Holmes in The Predynastic Lithic Industries of Upper Egypt, v. ii (Oxford 1989), 402, where the method of manufacture for this type of knife is discussed.
